SIP.BR.summary: Sipef NV operates as an agro-industrial company. The company operates through Palm, Rubber, Tea, and Bananas and Flowers segments. Its products include fresh fruit bunches, crude palm oil, palm kernel oil, crude palm kernel oil, natural rubber, tea, and bananas, as well as pineapple and lotus flowers, and foliage. The company operates a planted surface area of approximately 82,225 hectares. It has operations in Indonesia, Papua New Guinea, Ivory Coast, Europe, and internationally. The company was founded in 1919 and is headquartered in Schoten, Belgium.
